formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the SCM configuration to use. (Required)

formElement.label: Destination Directory:
formElement.documentation: A path relative to the job's workspace, where the source tree will be created. (Required)

formElement.label: Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the Starteam project. (Required)

formElement.label: View Name:
formElement.documentation: This can be the name of a single view or a ":"-separated view hierarchy as defined by Starteam. The hierarchy must start from the root view.

formElement.label: Folder Path:
formElement.documentation: You can leave this blank if the path that you are checking out is the root folder. If you want to check out a sub-path within the root folder, you can specify that path as a "/"-separated hierarchy, starting from the folder immediately below the root folder.

formElement.label: Label:
formElement.documentation: You can leave this blank if you don't use labels.

formElement.label: Additional Options:
formElement.documentation: This can be any option sent to starteam with correct spacing '-o -filter "IOGU"'.
